data.name: The List Demo
data.detailed_description:
The List: Late Night Demo takes place one year before the events of the full game. You are a new recruit to the West County Police Department assigned with the task of organizing the Grady Case. The system is rather old, so you might run into some errors, hopefully nothing to worry about!

The List: Late Night Demo only contains Day 1 of the 5 Grady interviews. You are also limited to a certain amount of clips of Day 1 before the demo comes to a close. You will not be able to continue once you reach this point.

This demo is meant to give you a taste of what kind of experience you can expect in the full game.

How do you play?
Listen to what Grady has to say. By using the police database, you can search for keywords in the conversation to help form a better picture of what Grady is talking about. Although, like any good detective, sometimes you will need to make deductions of your own. Some of the most important clues may be what you find between the clips.

Good luck, Recruit!

data.short_description: One year before the events of The List; A new recruit to The West County Police Department is tasked to organize the gone cold Grady Case for archival purposes. It's a late relaxing night. Hopefully nothing will change that.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The List contains mature language and themes.
